 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָבַל‎</span>] **verb** ==bear a heavy load== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְבַל‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; compare also below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זבל‎</span> above); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְבָלָם‎</span> [[Isa.53.4|Isa 53:4]] 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָבָ֑לְנוּ‎</span> [[Lam.5.7|Lam 5:7]] — ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסְבֹּל‎</span> [[Isa.53.11|Isa 53:11]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶסְבֹּל‎</span> [[Isa.46.4|Isa 46:4]] 3 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסְבְּלֻהוּ‎</span> [[Isa.46.7|Isa 46:7]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִסְבֹּל‎</span> [[Gen.49.15|Gen 49:15]] — ***bear*** a load, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֵּט שִׁכְמוֺ לִסְבֹּל‎</span> [[Gen.49.15|Gen 49:15]] (poem in [[BDB#J|J]]; of Issachar under figure of ass); of carrying an idol [[Isa.46.7|Isa 46:7]] of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> carrying Israel v[[Isa.46.4|Isa 46:4]] v[[Isa.46.4|Isa 46:4]] servant of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> carrying load of pain [[Isa.53.4|Isa 53:4]] and guilt v[[Isa.53.11|Isa 53:11]] Israel bearing iniquities of fathers [[Lam.5.7|Lam 5:7]]. **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְסֻבָּלִים‎</span> ***laden***, [[Ps.144.14|Ps 144:14]] (i.e. pregnant [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Hup|Hup-Now]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] and others; perhaps better, token of abundant harvest, so many, see especially [[BDB#Bae|Bae]]). **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיִסְתַּכֵּל הֶחָגָב‎</span> [[Eccl.12.5|Eccl 12:5]] ***drag oneself along***, as a burden (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָגָב‎</span>).
